title: Interworld
description: New York Times bestseller by award-winning writers Neil Gaiman and Michael Reaves.Joey Harker isn't a hero.In fact, he's the kind of boy who gets lost in his own house. But one day, Joey gets really lost. He walks straight out of his world and into another one. Suddenly Joey is prey to power-hungry forces of magic and science, each determined to harness his ability to travel between dimensions. The only thing standing in their way is Joey - or more precisely, an army of Joeys, all from different dimensions and all determined to save the worlds.Now Joey must make a choice - return to the life he knows or join the battle to the end.
author: Neil Gaiman
